transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji boliye. Ji ji Achar Services mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Pallavi baat kar rahi hu main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye mam.
Executive: Okay. To aapki jo do complaints chal rahi thi na, ek to
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jo aapke buyer hai na Shiv Shankar, Shiv Shankar ji ne call kiya tha hamare customer care mein dobara se complaint ke regarding.
Customer: To woh unka complaint resolve karaiye na Shiv Shankar ji ka.
Executive: Kya unka kya complaint hai? Kya bol rahe hai woh?
Executive: Mam unhone chemical liya tha na aapse I think kuch dedh lakh tak ka.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Dedh lakh ka unhone aapse chemical purchase kiya tha.
Executive: To unhone 20 September
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Bata rahi hu bata rahi hu dedh lakh ki deal thi. 20 September ko unhone aapko payment kiya tha phone pe se.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Theek hai? Aapne unko 6 din mein deliver kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Ab woh keh rahe hai ki woh fake product tha. To yeh keh rahe hai ki return the product and want refund.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To mam inka number aap provide kara sakti hai kya? Main baat kar leti hu. Shiv Shankar ji ka number main de deti hu aapko ek second. Inka number na last mein 338 hai.
Customer: 338 hai? Pura number nahi hai kya?
Executive: Likhiye likhiye 776600
Customer: 776600
Executive: 733
Customer: 733
Executive: 38
Customer: 38. Haan number repeat kar rahi hu. 766007338.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay. Theek hai main baat kar leti hu.
Executive: Shiv Shankar ji ki complaint hai. Inki kaafi purani complaint hai na aur yeh woh kya kehte hai kal inhone customer care mein hamare call bhi kiya tha. Inse baat kar lijiye jo bhi hai inka problem.
Customer: Isliye main puch rahi thi na kyunki yeh jo customer aap jinka naam bata rahi hai inhone yahan se to chemical abhi liya nahi hai isliye mere paas number nahi hai yeh month aur second month ka bhi. To aapne jaise bataya pura ji ji main baat kar leti hu.
Executive: Purana hai yeh September ka complaint hai shayad yeh haan.
Customer: Achha. Theek hai. Yeh keh rahe hai September mein inhone liya tha 6 September ko maine aapko date bataya na abhi?
Customer: Haan ji. 6 September. Inse baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Baaki jo dusra complaint hai jo buyer ne complaint kiya hai unhone kuch proof nahi diye hai abhi tak. To woh hamari team ko dekhenge ki agar woh kuch documents nahi denge to hum unki ticket close kar denge. Unka complaint close kar denge.
Customer: To second wale ka number kya hai? Unka agar unse bhi meri baat ho jati to unka number hai kya aapke paas?
Executive: Uh, ek minute.
Executive: Mam unka to number nahi mil raha hai. Meri team ne bhi unse kuch kuch documents maange hai mam woh wala abhi uske liye hum bata denge jaisa bhi rahega. Pehle Shiv Shankar ji se baat kar lijiye kyunki inhone customer care mein.
Customer: Yeh main inhi se 600. Haan Shiv Shankar ji se main baat kar leti hu. Inhone kya bola hai? Dedh lakh ka liya hai. Theek hai? Aur haan dedh lakh ka chemical liya tha phir unhone kaha ki chemical fake hai ya kis tarike ka.
Customer: To dedh lakh ka jo unhone aapke saath kuch screenshot vagerah hoga payment ka woh bhej sakte hai woh?
Executive: Haan mam unhone hame diya hai saare details.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: To mam ek baat bataiye yeh wala complaint na hamari team handle bhi karti hai. I think maine kal aapko ek Sahil ka number diya tha na?
Customer: Sahil.
Executive: Aapne to nahi diya mam Sahil ka number. Sir sir ne Akhil ji ne mujhe call kiya tha to maine kaha tha mam ki yeh Sahil complaint handle kar rahe hai IndiaMART se unka email ID.
Customer: Achha. Meri baat hui thi kya aap unse?
Executive: Mam ab aap dekh lijiye. Ab apna Akhil ji se baat kar lijiye ki yeh wala number hai Shiv Shankar ji ka complaint abhi bhi chal raha hai. To jo bhi hai unse baat kar lijiye aur mam aap mujhe hi phone kariye. Aap alag alag logo ko kyun phone kar rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi main to meri to kisi se bhi baat hi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Hai na aapko aapko kisi se baat nahi karni hai mam aapko sirf aap mere se baat kar lijiye ya buyer se baat karke problem resolve kara dijiye. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai main aapka number save kar rahi hu. Mujhe koi bhi problem hoga to main aapko hi call karungi ab se.
Executive: Uh theek hai theek hai okay mam.
Customer: Ji. Theek hai main inse baat kar leti hu.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai that's okay thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you mam.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello mam aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello. Haan boliye.
Executive: Mam main aapko na apna WhatsApp number bhi de deti hu.
Customer: Theek hai. Haan ji aap aapko kuch bhi dikkat rehti hai to aap mujhe WhatsApp pe coordinate kariye iske regarding. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan boliye mam WhatsApp number.
Executive: WhatsApp pe main aapko hi bhej deti hu. Yeh aapka number hai na last mein 258?
Customer: Haan haan yeh mera. Theek hai yeh mera WhatsApp number hai. WhatsApp pe hi bhej dijiye aapko. Theek hai. Theek hai mam bhej dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai mam bhej dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to resolve Shiv Shankar's complaint.

- Customer needs the second buyer's contact number.



Resolution:

- Executive provided Shiv Shankar's contact number.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact Shiv Shankar.

- Customer will contact the executive for any issues.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, resolution, contact, whatsapp
